title: Trying to find this foundry
content:
Super vague description but here it goes:

• They had a really beautiful old french script font.

• The website was comprised of floating old Apple OS windows, where you select a nav option and then it pop up another OS window for secondary nav.

• when you tested a font it would place the words over the canvas/screen on little rectangles (like those fridge magnets) and you could alter color of background/foreground.

• they didn't have a lot of fonts.

Any ideas?

Would love some help.
author: markatos

comments.content: The second point of your description was the key. I hate the navigation on that site! ;^)
